page.title: 07SWIMMING AT CAPEL SCHOOL
page.content: PUPILS FROM CAPEL SCHOOL GO TO{ST. {JOHN'S SWIMMING POOL,}TUNBRIDGE WELLS, ON WEDNESDAY EACH WEEK THROUGHOUT THE YEAR BY COACH. THEY ARE TAUGHT BY THEIR OWN TEACHERS WHO ACCOMPANY THEM TO THE BATHS. THERE ARE THREE POOLS, THE LEARNER POOL, MAIN POOL AND DIVING POOL.CLASSES 1 AND 2 LEAVE AT 3PM AND RETURN AT 5 PM.{WE HAVE THREE STAGES {OF PROFICIENCY}- THE PRELIMINARY FOR BEGINNERS, STAGE 2 FOR BETTER SWIMMERS AND BRONZE, SILVER AND GOLD AWARDS FOR ADVANCED. I LIKE THE DIVING POOL BEST AND MY OTHER FAVOURITE ACTIVITY IS SWIMMING UNDER WATER. SOMETIMES WE HAVE TO DO A SURFACE DIVE. EVERY YEAR CAPEL SCHOOL HAS A SPONSORED SWIM TO RAISE FUNDS FOLLOWED BY{A FABULOUS {GALA.}WE HAVE TEAM RACES AND FUN RACES AS WELL AS INDIVIDUAL EVENTS LIKE BACK STROKE, FRONT CRAWL AND BREAST STROKE. {IT IS GOOD FUN.}
